member.name: T:OpenSSL.Base
member.summary: Base class for all openssl wrapped objects. Contains the raw unmanaged pointer and has a Handle property to get access to it. Also overloads the ToString() method with a BIO print.

member.name: M:OpenSSL.Base.#ctor(System.IntPtr,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor which takes the raw unmanged pointer. This is the only way to construct this object and all dervied types.

member.name: M:OpenSSL.Base.Print(OpenSSL.BIO)
member.summary: This method is used by the ToString() implementation. A great number of openssl objects support printing, so this is a conveinence method. Dervied types should override this method and not ToString().
member.param: The BIO stream object to print into

member.name: M:OpenSSL.Base.ToString
member.summary: Override of ToString() which uses Print() into a BIO memory buffer.

member.name: P:OpenSSL.Base.Handle
member.summary: Access to the raw unmanaged pointer. Implements the IStackable interface.

member.name: P:OpenSSL.X509Certificate.Subject
member.summary: This is the subject of the certificate

member.name: T:OpenSSL.CryptoKey
member.summary: Wraps the native OpenSSL EVP_PKEY object
